fullText: Even more surprising is that one of those shows, “The Heart of Rock and Roll,” which opened Monday night at the James Earl Jones Theatre, has turned out to be an underdog highlight of the season.
bwwExcerpt: Rolled out modestly, little “Heart” is also a lot more fun and proudly frivolous than any of its sober-minded neighbors. It’s perhaps the first time in my life that I’ve been happy to see a confetti cannon at curtain call.
dtliExcerpt: Even more surprising is that one of those shows, “The Heart of Rock and Roll,” which opened Monday night at the James Earl Jones Theatre, has turned out to be an underdog highlight of the season.

keyPhrases.quote: an underdog highlight of the season

llmScore.reasoning: Claude: The critic calls it an 'underdog highlight of the season' which signals strong positive sentiment, but this appears to be just an excerpt lacking detail about specific elements. | GPT-4o-mini: The review indicates a strong positive sentiment by labeling the show as an 'underdog highlight', suggesting a recommendation to see it.
